prompt: A robot finds an ancient map under the desert sands...
story_text: and then a lot of zombified mummies made of ice cream sandwiches came through the walls. The robot must perform kung-fu to fight off the zombie mummies and escape with the ancient map.

prompt: An explorer stumbles upon a talking tree in the jungle...
story_text: the tree grants the explorer three wishes, the man wishes for bravery, strawberries and a talking monkey.
